Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Extends historic homeownership rehabilitation tax credit and requires additional reporting
Summary: Extends the benefit window of the historic homeownership rehabilitation tax credit; requires additional reporting on the utilization of such credit.
LawCode: Amd ยง606, Tax L; amd ยง14.05, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to extending the historic homeownership rehabilitation tax credit and requiring additional reporting
